title: Make a Horseshoe Pack
brief: Create a simple over-the-shoulder pack using square material like a poncho or blanket.
steps: Step 1: Lay square material (poncho, blanket, or canvas) flat on the ground.
Step 2: Place items along one edge of the material, padding any hard items.
Step 3: Roll the material with items toward the opposite edge.
Step 4: Tie both ends of the roll securely.
Step 5: Add extra ties along the length of the bundle for security.
Step 6: Connect the two ends with a line to create a shoulder strap.
Step 7: Drape over one shoulder for carrying.
warnings: Pad hard items to prevent them from poking through the material.
Ensure all ties are secure to prevent items from falling out.
Balance weight distribution to prevent shoulder strain during long carries.
